<title level="1" right="Trait">[Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 634 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

An action with this trait involves moving from one space to another.
name: Move
